name: Heian Shodan
hiraganaName: へいあん しょだん
description: Heian Shodan is the first kata in the Heian series and is usually the first kata that a beginner must learn. It has 21 movements and its embusen (floor pattern) is roughly I-shaped. This kata takes the student through a similar floor pattern as Taikyoku Shodan, but incorporates different techniques including hammer fist (tettsui-uchi) and knife hand blocks (shutō-uke). The kata also introduces changing stances from the normal front stance (zenkutsu-dachi) into back stance (Kōkutsu-dachi). The word Heian is a combination of Heiwan meaning 'Peacefulness' and Antei meaning 'Calmness.' For this reason, the meaning of the kata signifies a 'Peaceful Mind.' The name suggests that the student who has mastered the five Heian forms can be confident in his ability to defend himself, and hence would be able to adopt a state of 'Peaceful Mind.' The original versions were named Pinan and were created by Master Itosu in the early 1900s, later adapted by Master Funakoshi for the Shotokan style.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, step out to hachiji-dachi position and assume the ready stance (yōi) with fists clenched and thumbs on top of the fingers

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the left and move left foot to the left in zenkutsu-dachi position, while doing a low blocking of the left arm (gedan-barai) and right hikite

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Advance the right foot on the same axis in zenkutsu-dachi position, while giving a right punch (oi-zuki) at the plexus level, left fist brought back in hikite

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Swivel on the left leg 180° backwards looking over the right shoulder, and perform a low blocking (gedan-barai) of the right arm in zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ てっつい まわし うち
subMoves.description: Bring the right foot back, in the position renoji-dachi. Pull the right wrist back and strike forward vertically with a hammer fist (tettsui-uchi)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Immediately chase with a direct blow of the plexus fist (oi-zuki) by advancing the left foot in zenkutsu-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Pivot on the right foot by bringing the left foot 90° to the left in the central axis of the kata, in zenkutsu-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん あげうけ
subMoves.description: Perform a high level upward blockage by raising the right arm (jōdan age-uke), while advancing the right foot in zenkutsu-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん あげうけ
subMoves.description: Advance the left foot in zenkutsu-dachi, realizing a blocking upward left level high (jōdan age-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん あげうけ
subMoves.description: Advance the right foot in zenkutsu-dachi, realizing a right ascending right block (jōdan age-uke) with KIAI

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Pivot on the right foot by bringing the left foot 90° to the left, in zenkutsu-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Advance the right foot on the same axis in zenkutsu-dachi position, while giving a right punch at the plexus level (oi-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Look backward, turn left leg 180° backwards looking over right shoulder, blocking swept lower right arm (gedan-barai) in zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Immediately chase with a direct blow of the plexus fist (oi-zuki) by advancing the left foot in zenkutsu-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Pivot on the right foot by bringing the left foot 90° to the left in the central axis of the kata, in zenkutsu-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Advance the right foot on the same axis in zenkutsu-dachi position, while giving a right punch (oi-zuki) at the plexus level

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Immediately chase with a direct blow of the fist (oi-zuki) to the plexus by advancing the left foot in zenkutsu-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Advance the right foot on the same axis in zenkutsu-dachi position, while giving a right punch (oi-zuki) at the plexus level with KIAI

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Pivot on the right foot by bringing the left foot 90° to the left, back position Kōkutsu-dachi. Block with the sword of the left hand middle level (shutō-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Pivot on the left foot by bringing the right foot 45° to the right, back Kōkutsu-dachi position. Block with the sword of the right hand middle level (shutō-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Swivel on the left foot by bringing the right foot 45° from the previous axis to the right, in the back position Kōkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Pivot on the right foot by bringing the left foot 45° to the left, back position Kōkutsu-dachi. Block with the sword of the left hand level medium (shutō-uke) with KIAI

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.description: From the Kōkutsu-dachi position, step back to hachiji-dachi position and assume the ready stance (yōi) with fists clenched and thumbs on top of the fingers

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs
